fractal

Class HistogramLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fractal.Layer
      • fractal.HistogramLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HistogramLayer
extends Layer
    This is one of the two included layers that all installs of this program has. It sorts all the points outside the fractal based on their approximate distance from the fractal. It then assigns each point a color proportional to its location in the list, such that the point at the 34% percentile would get the color at the 34% percentile of the palette.
    Author:
    Calvin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • HistogramLayer

        public HistogramLayer()
        Creates default bailout and maxIterations values for the layer to use. It also assigns this layer a description so that users can understand what it does in the layer editor. Bailout = 1000, maxIterations = 400;
